title: Purpose of Sorting
text: Sorting a column helps in arranging data systematically.

title: Order of Data
text: Data can be sorted in ways such as ascending or descending order.

title: Organizing Information
text: Sorting is used to organize information for better analysis.

title: Sorting vs. Formatting
text: Sorting does not change the appearance of the data, only its order.

title: Sorting vs. Deleting
text: Sorting does not remove any data from the spreadsheet.

hintAnswer: To organize data in a specific order, such as ascending or descending.
title: Purpose of Sorting
text: Which of the following is the purpose of sorting a column?
choices: To organize data in a specific order, such as ascending or descending.
To delete duplicate entries in the column.
To change the font style of the data in the column.
To merge cells in the column.
